title.narrative: STRENGTHEN CAPACITY TO SCALEUP NUTRITION

description.narrative: Strengthened national capacity to advocate, legislate and plan for scaling up nutrition (SUN)., which contributes to Nutrition â€“ General, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Evidence and coordination enables government, communities and partners to improve capacity and systems for equity-focused funding, advocacy , policies & legislation, strategies, planning & supply chain management to scale up results for children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national capacity to advocate, legislate and plan for scaling up nutrition (SUN).

description.narrative: During the country program significant progress was made including commitment from the Government of Sudan to join the SUN movement, the establishment of country networks, the development of a national Investment Case and the strong inclusion of multisectoral action for nutrition in the Multi-Year Humanitarian Response Plan (MYHRP). | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:16/01/2018
